name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-meetings-notification-csharp
title: In-meeting notification app
shortDescription: This sample application demonstrates how to implement in-meeting and targeted notifications within Microsoft Teams meetings using adaptive cards and bot interactions.
longDescription: This sample application showcases the implementation of in-meeting and targeted notifications for scheduled Microsoft Teams meetings, utilizing adaptive cards for enhanced user interaction. Users can interact with the bot to view agenda items and submit feedback, ensuring a dynamic meeting experience.

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
